hero.title: Hi, I'm Zaher
hero.description: A passionate web developer focused on building responsive, user-friendly, and modern websites. I love learning new technologies and turning creative ideas into reality through code. Always learning. Always improving.

skills.title: My Skills
skills.description:
I have experience working with various programming languages and technologies across both front-end and back-end development. I build web applications using JavaScript, C#, HTML, CSS, Java, PHP, Python, and SQL/MySQL, and develop dynamic solutions with Node.js and React.

I also work with WordPress to create content-driven websites, use Git for version control, and apply Tailwind CSS to build modern and responsive interfaces. I’m continuously developing my skills through new projects and hands-on learning.

about.title: About Me
about.description:
I'm a motivated and curious Web Developer and graduate from Karlstad University, with a strong passion for creating clean, responsive, and user-friendly websites. With experience in languages and frameworks such as C#, Java, PHP, Node.js, SQL, JavaScript, and React, I am adaptable and always eager to expand my skill set. I enjoy learning new technologies and improving my skills in both front-end and back-end development. My goal is to grow as a developer, become a full-stack developer, contribute to projects that make a difference, and continue learning every day to build better digital experiences.

Currently, I’m focusing on:

- Web Development: Building responsive and interactive websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Tailwind CSS.

- App Development: Creating small desktop and mobile applications using C# and Java.

- Continuous Learning: Exploring new tools and frameworks to improve my coding skills and problem-solving mindset.

- Creative Projects: Working on personal projects that help me apply what I learn and develop my creativity.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: I'm excited to hear from you! Whether you have a question, a project idea, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out using the form below. I'll do my best to get back to you as soon as possible.

alert.successFooter: I will get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you!
alert.errorText: An error occurred while sending your message.
alert.errorFooter: Please try again later or use the email link below the form to contact me directly.
alert.networkText: Something went wrong while sending. Please check your connection or try again later.
alert.networkFooter: If the problem persists, use the email link below the form to contact me directly.

projectOne.title: File Manager
projectOne.description: A C# desktop app that allows users to manage files and folders with basic operations like create, rename, and delete.

projectTwo.title: Manager System
projectTwo.description: A C# inventory and sales system where users can add, update, or remove products, manage a shopping cart, and complete purchases. Stock levels update automatically through an API, and the POS handles checkout operations.

projectThree.title: Quiz Website
projectThree.description: A web-based quiz application built with ASP.NET MVC (C#), HTML, CSS and SQL Server. It uses a database to store questions and results, and I am continuing to develop it by adding new features and improving the user experience.

projectFour.title: Movie website
projectFour.description: Using HTML, CSS and JavaScript with API to create a movie website that allows users to browse and search for movies and view details. The site is designed to be responsive and user-friendly, providing an engaging experience across all devices.

projectFive.title: Portfolio Website
projectFive.description: A personal portfolio website built with React and Tailwind CSS to showcase my skills, projects and contact information in a clean and responsive layout.
